episodes.title: how wise is it to do another CULT ep? (feat. James Hruska, LCSW)
episodes.description: Cults are all around us...on TV, on our phones, and maybe even we're in one. James Hruska (LCSW) joins us for this rousing discussion about hit HBO cult docuseries "The Vow" and the affiliated NXIVM cult founded by Keith Raniere. - music by blanket forts -
